phrases: What did you call me out here for?
I thought we could check answers, like we promised.
Did you find out what future course Yukino-chan picked?
I do know, yes...
But it would not be fair for me to be the one to tell you.
Ah, how dutiful of you.
But I see...
So she actually told you.
Yukino-chan really trusts you, huh?
I would not call it trust...
I do not think that is what it is, in my case.
Oh, so you do realize it.
You are right.
It is not trust.
It is something much more cruel...
Nothing's changed.
And she thinks it is fine that way.
That is part of what makes her so cute, but still...
It is what I cannot stand about her.
If it is not trust, then what is it?
Who can say?
But at the very least, I would not call it the real thing.
Those were your words, right?
Does that real thing even exist?
My Teen Romantic Comedy SNAFU TOO!
Man...
I want to eat something sweet!
Know what I mean?
Do not you want to eat a little chocolate?
Huh?
Get it?
A little chocolate?
Yeah, it is almost that time, is not it?
You will be fine, Hayato-kun, but we are in big trouble.
Yeah, but you know,
Hayato-kun does not usually accept Valentine's chocolates.
Seriously?
What a waste!
But it is kind of scary getting it from someone you do not know well, right?
Well, yeah, giving handmade is kind of heavy...
I can understand why he would not accept those.
Heavy?
That is true...
Just a little chocolate?
Handmade, huh...
Why did you leave first?
Wait, I never said I would go with you.
I thought you were waiting for me.
You stayed in the classroom for a while...
No, I was just checking out how Hayama and Miura were doing...
Oh...
Yeah.
I think they are okay now.
That kind of thing is nice, is not it?
It is like they really treasure what they have right now.
Like the present time is the best time...
Yeah.
Maybe the present time is the best time.
Wow!
That is unusually optimistic of you, Hikki!
Recalling the past dredges up regrets that make me want to die,
and when I think of the future, the anxiety just makes me depressed.
By process of elimination, you could say right now is my happiest time.
It was pessimistic after all!
You are so quick to say stuff like that...
Do you... have any free days coming up?
Y-Yeah...
Um, probably...
I am pretty much free...
I guess...
L-Let me think about it.
S-Sure.
Yahello!
Senpai, you are late!
And again, why are you here?
By the way, Senpai,
not that it matters, but do you like sweets?
I think Hayama would be glad to eat anything you give him.
But they were saying Hayato-kun does not accept chocolates.
What?!
Why not?
I am not sure...
Because it would cause arguments, obviously.
In grade school, the mood in the
classroom the following day was always strained.
Okay, then I guess you will do, Senpai.
Do you like sweets?
That is not the right way to ask that.
Hikki...
does like sweets!
Yes, he does.
I am not sure why you two answered that, but...
That is perfect, then!
Uh, what is?
I was not sure how sweet I should make them.
Everyone has different tastes, right?
How sweet?
Are you planning on making your own?
Surprising.
Why is it surprising?!
I am really good at making sweets!
Anyway, so I thought
I could use you as a reference to make obligatory chocolate.
Obligatory, huh?
Oh, are you one of those guys who is never gotten chocolate before?
Hikki...
will get chocolate.
Right?
Huh?
Does that mean...
That is right.
I have got Komachi, you know.
Komachi?
Who is that?
The rice?
She is not rice.
Oh, Komachi-chan is Hikki's little sister.
Sister complex?
Idiot!
No!
I am not sure I can deny that.
So you do like younger girls, Senpai.
I do not.
Besides, since your birthday's in April, there is less than a year between us,
so I do not really think of you as younger than me.
What?
Uh, nothing...
I was just a little surprised.
Whoa, scary!
Why do you know her birthday?
That is creepy, Hikki!
Seriously creepy!
You certainly know her well.
No, Isshiki said it herself the other day,
when the little sneak was trying to look pointlessly appealing.
Pointlessly?!
It was not pointless!
And I am not a sneak!
You are a bigger sneak than I am!
How do I put it?
I want to try making chocolate.
We will be studying for exams next year...
So I figured I could at least try it once.
Yumiko, did not you say giving handmade is kind of heavy?
W-Well...
Hey, I think handmade is a great idea.
Hikitani-kun, why do not you make friendship chocolate for Hayato-kun, too?
Not happening.
He does not accept chocolate anyway, does he?
It is okay if it is between boys!
What you are assuming is not okay.
That is right...
If he says he will not accept any, that makes it tough.
That is for sure.
Yikes, they are scary.
So, did you need something?
Er... Well...
You know, I was not done talking yet.
What?
You are just drinking tea.
What?
Now, now...
Sakisaki, you had something to say, too, right?
Just tell us about it.
Well...
It is about chocolate...
You want to give someone chocolate?
That is hilarious.
What?
What?
Look, could you stop assuming I am like you?
What?
What?
Stop!
Please play nice!
And?
What about chocolate?
My sister said she wants to make some.
Is there a kind that even a little kid can make?
That even a little kid can make...
But, Sakisaki, are not you good at housework?
The stuff I make is sort of plain...
I am not sure a little kid would like it.
What kinds of things can you make, anyway?
Sim
Simmered taro balls.
Yeah, that is plain.
I think that sounds nice!
I mean, I cannot cook at all, so I think that is amazing!
Do not you, Yukinon?
Yes.
Nikkorogashi sounds a bit like nekkorogashi,
so it sounds rather cute.
That was a weird comment to follow up with!
Cats have nothing to do with anything.
This is quite a problem, though.
Yeah.
It is kind of a problem that Miura-senpai seems to be serious about this.
I was talking about the number of requests for help we have received.
I kind of understand how Hayato-kun feels, though.
Well, I mean, you know...
It would probably give me all kinds of weird ideas about stuff...
Oh...
That sounds like you, Yui-senpai.
You... think so?
That sounds like me, huh?
Well, would not you just need an excuse, then?
Like, a front that is convincing to Hayama.
Huh?
If he has no choice but to accept them...
Or if the situation makes it natural for him to accept them,
it is a different story, right?
In other words,
you mean she just needs to have an excuse?
For example, instead of saying it is for Valentine's,
if you just ask him to taste-test it, he would probably eat it.
Probably.
Not that I would know.
That is it!
We should make some together!
That is a great idea!
It will be like an event for all of us who came with requests,
where Yukinoshita-senpai can teach all of us how to make it!
Y-Yes...
That would be fine with me...
Hey, Vice President?
I am going to need a project proposal!
What about me?
Yuigahama-san...
You can make some with me.
You do not trust me at all!
Uh, then what should Hikki do?
I cannot cook.
That does not matter.
You can taste them and give your opinions.
Now that I can do.
It is my best subject.
Okay, thanks.
Honmoku Makito
So anyway, I will handle the details.
Let us have a cooking class!
Chiba City Mihama Ward Takasu Community Center
Almost Valentine's Day!
Cooking Class
Information
Yeah, the reaction to our last event was great,
and it generated a lot of buzz.
I hope we can continue working in alliance from now on.
Me, too.
Y-You guys are here, too?
Oh, did not I tell you?
Well, I do not think I had a log of it in our emails...
What the hell?
You look way too cute.
Hey, Pres, we would like to get started.
All right, then...
This is a business chance, as well.
We can use crowd funding to raise funds...
What is with them?
It is best if we can make this a joint effort
and pull some of the budget from them, right?
And luckily for me, it saves me the cost of obligatory chocolate!
R-Right...
Well, that idea aside...
You are more impressive than I thought, Isshiki-san.
Yahello!
Nee-san...
Sorry I am late.
Anyway, this is today's special instructor, Haru-san-senpai.
Hi!
I am Haru-san-senpai!
Why did you ask her to come?
Well, she seems like a total veteran at this stuff, right?
I would have been sufficient on my own...
Cut up the chocolate and warm it with hot water.
Then let it cool and pour it into molds.
That is it?
Well, basically, yes.
Huh...
That seems kind of easy.
You are naIve, Yumiko!
Warming it with hot water does not mean you put it in hot water!
You do it more like this!
Like this!
You really do not mind me bringing her?
I do not see a problem with it.
Yeah?
Kei-chan, what kind of candy would you like?
Eel!
O-Oh, really?
Sorry!
O-Our family had eel the other day, and she really liked it...
In other countries, it is common for men to give the gifts.
I think we should focus on that sort of globalization.
You really thought this out.
This way,
they can all act natural.
It is even made Tobe happy.
Chocolate!
I do not care about chocolate or Tobe.
Especially Tobe.
That is harsh.
Hayato!
You are really good at cooking.
What is this?
Are you hitting on me?
If you think whispering sweet nothings will work because I am making sweets,
then you are being naIve.
You are going to have to try again.
I am sorry.
Here!
Senpai, do you dislike sweet things like this?
I guess you would call it a difference in awareness between Japan and other countries.
Hikigaya, got any extra chocolate molds?
Uh, sure.
Thanks!
Come to think of it, did I ever give you chocolate?
No, you did not.
Oh, okay!
I will give you some this year, then.
Er... Uh, really?
Speaking of, Yukino-chan gave you chocolate once, did not she?
Yeah, she did.
Right before we started grade school,
she gave some to both you and me.
So, who are you giving yours to, Yukino-chan?
I do not see what that has to do with you.
You did not say you are not giving it to anyone.
So you are giving it to someone.
Well, there are only so many people you could give it to...
This is nonsense.
Say whatever you wan
S-Sorry!
It is okay...
Why is she all flustered?
Seeing her like that is going to make me flustered, too...
Do not get flustered...
You have still got a way to go yourself, Yukinon.
I am a master at handling bowls and cooking utensils!
Yeah, it is the rest of it that you are fatally flawed in.
This turned out to be a great event.
Yeah.
It is an event I do not really get, though.
That is just fine.
You are a guy who does not really get much, anyway.
The people you are involved with with do not get much, either.
It is only natural it would turn out this way.
Saying I do not get much is kind of mean...
Well, I guess you understand a little more now than you used to.
Your impressions of people are renewed every day.
As you spend time with them
and grow with them, you come to understand more.
I do not particularly feel like I have grown.
I always keep doing the same things.
When you are walking, you do not look back at the distance you have covered.
Of course, from the viewpoint of someone who stopped walking,
the more distance they have covered, the more betrayed they feel.
I am glad I got to see all of this up close now.
Because I will not be able to watch you guys forever.
Hikki!
Try these!
All right.
I will eat it.
You look like you are preparing for the worst, but do not worry.
I made them with her.
Oh, that is a relief, then.
Did you just say something really mean?!
Well, so...
Thanks.
Sure!
Is that the real thing you were talking about?
Are times like these your real thing?
I am not sure...
Is this it?
I do not think you are that kind of guy.
Are you that boring?
If I were interesting, I would be the most loved guy in my class.
I like that side of you.
But the way you guys are being now...
is kind of boring me.
I liked you better before, Yukino-chan.
I am just not used to it.
I have never experienced it before.
I thought it just felt a little awkward because of that.
I thought I would get used to it, and eventually accept it.
But you just would not overlook that awkwardness.
The student council will handle the rest, so you do not have to worry.
We will still help out until it is over.
Yes.
There is no need for any reservation.
Really?
Okay, I will take you up on that.
Yukinoshita Haruno attacks me with the things
that I have always tried not to think about.
It is not trust.
It is something more cruel...
Something repulsive.
Mom?
Why are you here?
Haruno told me about the future course you have chosen.
Yukino, what have you been doing until this late hour?
I thought you were a child who would not do these sorts of things...
I let you live your own life because I trusted you...
No.
This is my responsibility.
It was my mistake.
Was it my fault?
Um...
There was a student council event today, and... we were helping...
I see.
And you were walking her home?
Thank you.
But if you are out too late, I am sure your family will worry, as well.
Yes?
I want you to live your own life, and be who you are.
But I am worried that you will take the wrong path.
I will explain everything.
So please, go home for today.
Who she is...
Who I am...
I think there is some part of us that is pre-determined by others,
and that part is always a bit off.
We want to be who we are.
But who, exactly, decides who that is?
W-Well, I am going to head home.
Oh... I will walk you...
It is okay.
I feel like it would not be fair.
Okay.
Who we are is always clashing with us somehow.
So where is the real thing?
Where is
Still, The Thing He Seeks Is Out of Reach, And He Continues to Mistake What is Real.
the real us?
13 Spring, Bound Beneath the Thick Snow, Begins to Sprout.
There is something I want.
But I am not smart or anything,
and it would not be fair.
There is only one answer for me.
But I am sure it is not the answer that everyone else wants.
What I desire and what is desired of me are so similar,
so why are they so different?
The truth is, I would not care if it was a lie...
